param.name: interval
param.label: Interval
param.description: Interval in milliseconds between animation frames. Default: 20

param.name: step
param.label: Step size
param.description: Progress step for each animation frame. This value is anything between 0.1 to 100. Default: 7

param.name: image_prefix
param.label: Image prefix
param.description: Image prefix will be used as a prefix for the URLs of the image sources. Default: images/stories/

param.name: source
param.label: HTML Source
param.description: HTML source that contains fadepanel tags.

param.name: hpp
param.label: Hide primary panel
param.description: Enable to hide the primary panel during the animation. If your panels have transparent areas the primary panel usually needs to be hidden. If your panels are opaque prefer not to hide the primary panel to gain speed. Default value: No

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached
